Room.Name: Hafnia Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hafnia Way, just south of Nagaritha Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Hafnia Way is a short road between Nagaritha Drive and Golden Dolphin Way. On the west side of this short street is the Marina Plaza shopping center. The entrance to this center is located to the south. The plaza boasts shops selling various leather goods, a repair shop, a training arena and other fine imports. On the east is the the DeNail Corn Field.
